comments.body: Hmm.  This was fixed between 0.20.2 and 0.20.203.  It seems I reported this against 203.  Is it possible I used 0.20.2 and looked at the source of 0.20.2 while thinking it was 203?  It is hard to remember what I was doing on that day two months ago.
